Upload GSM and LTE Profiles

Use this task to upload Global System for Mobile (GSM) profiles (2G) and Long-Term Evolution (LTE) profiles (4G) for service provider networks that you have previously downloaded and modified. Once, this profile is uploaded it can be given a new name and be assigned and applied to applicable vNodes.

  1. In the navigation bar, click Profiles > Summary.
  2. In the Profiles window, click Upload.
  3. In the Create Profile window, click +Choose.
  4. A pop-up system directory window appears. Navigate to the file on your system that you want to upload to the PW EMS, and click Open. The file appears in the Create Profile window. For example:
  5. Click Upload. The file appears in the GENERAL PROFILES tab in the Profiles window.
Parent topic: Create Device Profiles
